main event: A military policeman at Fort Knox spotted a bright red light, approximately 200 yards in diameter, moving slowly from east to west at a very low altitude.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 seconds.
The sighting occurred at 3:15 AM on June 8, 1966, under partly cloudy weather conditions.
The observer was a military policeman who reported the sighting through official channels.
The case was forwarded to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
The report states that the information provided was not sufficient for evaluation, and additional details were requested.
sighted object: a bright red light, approximately 200 yards in diameter
